front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for the Internet - Web Site Engineering, Web Site Management, and Web Site Life Cycle

abstract.t: Recommended practices for World Wide Web page engineering for Intranet and Extranet environments, based on World Wide Web Consortium (W3C\Â®) and related industry guidelines, are defined in this recommended practice. This recommended practice does not address stylistic considerations or human-factors considerations in web page design beyond limitations that reflect good engineering practice.
